label: 御霊
対訳語: Angry Spirits [A shrine dedicated to placating]
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A shrine designed to placate the spirits of Retired Emperor Sutoku and others. Two places by that name survive in Kyoto. Inoue 1979-1983: 2.249. [崇徳院. Two sites in Kyoto are knows as 上御霊 and 下御霊]
